Banner animation with AngularJS

UX specifications

In order to properly meet the specifications, message banners should be added to the DOM before the entering animation begins and removed from the DOM after the exiting animation ends.

For the sake of simplification, DOM manipulation was excluded from this demo.

Code implementation

It takes three steps to create this animation:

  1. Applying class="slide"
  2. Including the mixin slide(down, 54px)
  3. Inserting and removing class="in"

This is an animated warning message

@import "../../src/x1-ui-sass-tools"; .x1-messages-demo { background-color: $gray10-50; .alert { @include slide(down, 54px); } .dummy-section { overflow: hidden; margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2; } .dummy-article { background-color: $white; padding: $line-height-computed; } }
